00013 void OSMMap::setMinLat( double lat ) { m_minlat = lat; m_miny = Mercator::LatToY( lat ); }
00014 void OSMMap::setMaxLat( double lat ) { m_maxlat = lat; m_maxy = Mercator::LatToY( lat ); }
00015 void OSMMap::setMinLon( double lon ) { m_minlon = lon; m_minx = Mercator::LonToX( lon ); }
00016 void OSMMap::setMaxLon( double lon ) { m_maxlon = lon; m_maxx = Mercator::LonToX( lon ); }

00038 OSMNode OSMMap::node( int id ) 
00039 {

00043 OSMNode* OSMMap::getNodePtrById( int id )
00044 {
00045   for( int i = 0; i < m_nodes.count(); i++ )
00046   {
00047     if( m_nodes[i].id() == id )
00048       return &m_nodes[i];
00049   }
00050   
00051   return 0;
00052 }

00106 void OSMMap::paint( QPainter* painter )
00107 {
00108   //Ways
00109   foreach( OSMWay i, ways() )
00110   {
00111     //TODO: The min lat and lon need to be part of the object read from the XML file
00112     i.paint( painter, m_minx, m_miny, zoomMultiplier() );
00113   }
00114 }
00115 
00116 void OSMMap::zoomIn( int steps )
00117 {
00118   m_zoomlevel += steps;
00119 }
00120 
00121 void OSMMap::zoomOut( int steps )
00122 {
00123   m_zoomlevel -= steps;
00124 }
00125 
00126 void OSMMap::zoom( int level )
00127 {
00128   m_zoomlevel = level;
00129 }
00130 
00131 int OSMMap::zoomMultiplier()
00132 {
00133   //Zoom level 0 displays entire map in 800x800 display
00134   
00135   //Get zoom multiplier at level 0
00136   int multiplier;
00137   
00138   if( ( m_maxx - m_minx ) > ( m_maxy - m_miny ) )
00139     multiplier = 800 / ( m_maxx - m_minx );
00140   else
00141     multiplier = 800 / ( m_maxy - m_miny );
00142   
00143   for( int i = 0; i < m_zoomlevel; i++ )
00144     multiplier = multiplier * 2;
00145   
00146   return multiplier;
00147 }
